sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import DashboardLayout from './DashboardLayout'; import '../App.css'; const HrDashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('documents'); // Mock data const pendingDocuments = [ { id: 1, user: 'John Seller', vendorCode: 'S-23-SELL123', role: 'Seller', documentType: 'GST Registration', status: 'pending' }, { id: 2, user: 'Sarah Buyer', vendorCode: 'B-23-BUY456', role: 'Buyer', documentType: 'VAT Certificate', status: 'pending' } ]; const contactRequests = [ { id: 1, requester: 'Captain', vendorCode: 'C-23-CAPT789', reason: 'Need contact for dispute resolution', status: 'pending' } ]; const userIssues = [ { id: 1, user: 'Michael Transporter', vendorCode: 'TRN-23-TRN101', issue: 'Account access problem', status: 'open' } ]; return (
{activeTab === 'documents' && (

Pending Document Verifications

{pendingDocuments.map(doc => ( ))}
User Vendor Code Role Document Type Status Actions
{doc.user} {doc.vendorCode} {doc.role} {doc.documentType} {doc.status}
)} {activeTab === 'contacts' && (

Contact Detail Requests

{contactRequests.map(request => ( ))}
Requester Vendor Code Reason Status Actions
{request.requester} {request.vendorCode} {request.reason} {request.status}
)} {activeTab === 'users' && (

User Issue Management

{userIssues.map(issue => ( ))}
User Vendor Code Issue Status Actions
{issue.user} {issue.vendorCode} {issue.issue} {issue.status}
)} ); }; export default HrDashboard;
